about_the_game: In this 3D simulation shooting game, players will immerse themselves in a realistic virtual environment, experiencing the process of selecting different weapons to test their damage against targets. The game offers a variety of weapon options, ranging from classic rifles to modern pistols, each with unique performance characteristics and handling. Players can finely tune shooting parameters, observe, and analyze the impact of each shot on the target, thereby gaining a deeper understanding of the power and effectiveness of various weapons. This setup not only tests the player's operational skills but also adds a strategic layer and replayability to the game, ensuring that every shot is a challenge of skill.The development team will continue to refine and enhance the product in future updates.Players can collect coins to achieve victory.

Players can finely tune shooting parameters, observe, and analyze the impact of each shot on the target, thereby gaining a deeper understanding of the power and effectiveness of various weapons. This setup not only tests the player's operational skills but also adds a strategic layer and replayability to the game, ensuring that every shot is a challenge of skill.The development team will continue to refine and enhance the product in future updates.Players can collect coins to achieve victory.
name: Bullet Fury
short_description: In this 3D simulation shooting game, players can choose from a variety of weapons to conduct damage tests on targets.The development team will continue to refine and enhance the product in future updates.
